DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety tolerability AC105 follow regimen 6 intravenous dos 30 hour patient acute non-penetrating traumatic spinal cord injury ( SCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study AC105 Patients With Acute Traumatic Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 65 year age , inclusive Acute traumatic SCI , neurological level C4 T11 No evidence penetrate transection injury ( e.g . cause projectile stab wound ) Neurological ASIA Impairment Scale A , B C Patient able provide write verbal witnessed consent .
